com.im.njams.sdk.communication.kafka

Class KafkaReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.AbstractReceiver
      • com.im.njams.sdk.communication.kafka.KafkaReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Receiver, ClasspathValidator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SharedKafkaReceiver

    public class KafkaReceiver
extends AbstractReceiver
    Kafka implementation for a Receiver.
    Version:
    4.2.0-SNAPSHOT
    Author:
    sfaiz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONTENT_TYPE_JSON
      The value used with header "NJAMS_CONTENT" for JSON content type (the only supported one)
      static String NJAMS_CONTENT
      Name of the Kafka header storing the message's content type.
      static String NJAMS_MESSAGE_ID
      Name of the Kafka header storing a unique message ID
      static String NJAMS_RECEIVER
      Name of the Kafka header storing the receiver (client) path
      static String NJAMS_REPLY_FOR
      Name of the Kafka header storing the ID of the request message to that a reply message belongs
      static String NJAMS_TYPE
      Name of the Kafka header storing the request type

      • init

        public void init(Properties properties)
        Initializes this receiver via the given properties.
        Parameters:
        properties - the properties needed to initialize

      • connect

        public void connect()
        This method is called when the receiver has to connect. It can't be started if init(..) hasn't been called beforehand.
        Specified by:
        connect in class AbstractReceiver

      • stop

        public void stop()
        This method stops the Kafka receiver, if its status is ConnectionStatus.CONNECTED

      • onMessage

        public void onMessage(org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecord<String,String> msg)
        This method is called by the CommandsConsumer if a message arrives.
        Parameters:
        msg - the newly arrived Kafka message.

      • isValidMessage

        protected boolean isValidMessage(org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecord<?,?> msg)

      • getInstruction

        protected com.faizsiegeln.njams.messageformat.v4.command.Instruction getInstruction(org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecord<String,String> message)
                                                                             throws IOException
        This method tries to extract the Instruction out of the provided message. It maps the Json string to an Instruction object.
        Parameters:
        message - the Json Message
        Returns:
        the Instruction object that was extracted or null, if no valid instruction was found or it could be parsed to an instruction object.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the Instruction could not be extracted.

      • sendReply

        protected void sendReply(String requestId,
                         com.faizsiegeln.njams.messageformat.v4.command.Instruction instruction)
        This method tries to reply the instructions response back to nJAMS server.
        Parameters:
        requestId - The ID of the request to that this reply belongs
        instruction - the instruction that holds the response.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Description copied from interface: Receiver
        The implementation should return its name here, by which it can be identified. This name will be used as value in the CommunicationConfiguration via the Key
        Returns:
        the name of this Receiver:
